This paper presents the concept, sketches its architecture, explores its feasibility across technical, social, and conceptual dimensions, and proposes a framework for deployment in varied modalities (text, audio, video). The core bet is simple: by making reasoning structure visibleâ€”even imperfectlyâ€”we can foster better reflection without requiring cultural revolutions or cognitive overhauls.
